website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, versatile and affordable bag that will dazzle both on and off the basketball court.
pros: Includes 2 adjustable padded shoulder straps that deliver superior ergonomic support and lumbar protection
600 denier polyester construction guarantees the bag will maintain durability and appearance
Built-in storage pouches enable you to keep your keys, wallet, cell phone and other items in one spot
Can hold up to 2 basketballs at the same time
cons: Zippers sometimes break, even after limited use
Plastic pieces on straps may fall off over time

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of material along zippers-fails with first 10 days without heavy wear
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality of material on inside. Withing first 10 days the material starts ripping along the zippers without even much in there. The outside looks nice and our daughter loves the look, but the quality on where the zippers are is incredibly poor. This is really disappointing, This has not even been used heavily for sports and its already broken. Not worth the money. The company who sold it was great and send us a new replacement, but the replacement came with the zipper already broken we still have it and never even used it once. Still has tags on.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Stieger-Vanegas

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack, shoe compartment needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I do like this backpack. I can fit a change of clothes, a oversize towel, a hair towel, and a hand towel, as well as a large toiletry bag, and my running shoes. However, the sole reason I picked this bag was for the shoe compartment. You have to kind of stick your hand inside and hoist everything inside the bag up so you can shimmy your shoes in there. I just wish the compartment had sturdier walls or a better way to organize it. Maybe it would be better as a vertical compartment instead of horizontal on the bottom? Regardless, it has good space otherwise and is comfy to wear at least to and from the Y.
customer_reviews.author: Mollz

customer_reviews.title: however it looks as if the stitching around the zippers is not well done and lends to poor quality problems
customer_reviews.text: As per the review that we read and still purchased the front of the bag tore out in one month...which is outside the return policy because it was a Christmas present. I also have never written a review, however it looks as if the stitching around the zippers is not well done and lends to poor quality problems. I also do not like the fact that the review button has to use the word hate it, however it is a one star purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: andrea gamm

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for athletes
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing bag. It had the perfect size compartments to fit everything you need. It was very well designed. There is an easy access shoe compartment with ventilation on the side so that your shoes can air out. There is a ball compartment that can easily fit a basketball or soccer ball. The door to the ball compartment had a zipper encloser and also a latch to keep the ball from falling out. The main compartment has room for a change of clothes as well as pockets for misc like phone, walet etc. The shoulder straps are padded and feel comfortable. Overall one of the best gym bags I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: joel guevarra

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pack it too full
customer_reviews.text: I love the backpack because it’s so convenient it looks like it has plenty of space but once you actually get it it doesn’t really have that much so I tried to fit my sweatpants in the biggest pocket and it ripped on the inside and if you put your ball in the ball space it basically takes up the entire storage
customer_reviews.author: Carlie H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag was even bigger than I expected when I purchased it. I have 2 boys, 13, and 11. The separate space for the cleats has plenty of room. They keep their shin guards in there as well and there's still more room. The extra compartments are perfect for all the extra things they carry for games and practices. My boys love them. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for my 11 year old son.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the negative reviews for this bag. After my some has been using this bag for about a month the quality has held up. It is nice and big for all his gear, extra cleats, and ball. Some of his teammates have also ordered this bag after seeing my son with it. It may not be a name brand bag but the value and quality is a steak. Very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: christopher s.

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Bag
customer_reviews.text: I typically used duffel bags to carry my soccer stuff but I did not like how unorganized everything would be. I had tried using other regular backpacks but I had issues putting my cleats or indoors in the same bag. The material is not the best but it has been sturdy enough to hold everything I usually carry. I like having my things organized so I don't have to waste much time before games trying to find everything. This is not like your name brand bags but that is why it is more affordable. I would recommend this bag for anyone who would like to keep their soccer equipment organized.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my 6th grade son. Who unfortunately has to carry a ridiculous large binder to school (as per teachers request). It wouldn't fit in a regular backpack so purchasing this one worked out great. He can also carry his football to school without any problems or running out of room. My son, throws his backpack pretty much everywhere and it hasn't ripped or fallen apart. Wish I would have bought it earlier in the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different spaces in bag
customer_reviews.text: My grandson plays soccer for 2 different teams and this backpack has so many different pockets that he can use one backpack for both teams and still keep everything separated. Can’t really speak to durability yet but very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mischa

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball
customer_reviews.text: This is plenty big enough for bball shoes as well as a full sized basketball with loads of pockets and lots of extra room for stuff including a laptop. Highly recommend. I know it shows for soccer, but any sport would benefit from this.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Mark

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of room
customer_reviews.text: The bag was perfect for my daughter to replace two book bags. She doesn’t carry balls but does have a lunch bag. She loves the room and pockets. Had it monogrammed locally and it looks great. Hopefully it will hold up well, at least through a season.
customer_reviews.author: MyPurchase

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backpack, but the plastic strap holder piece broke after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The backpack itself is good quality, but one of the plastic pieces for the strap broke within a couple weeks of use. That is why I did not give this product 5 stars. I used a clip off another backpack to make it fully functional again. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David and Tera

customer_reviews.title: Right Choice
customer_reviews.text: I am doing great making the right choices for my granddaughter she was so excited to receive this sports bag and it accommodates every sport she plays are may want to play. It seems to be well made and durable, we will see how many seasons it makes it through and I will update at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaA

customer_reviews.title: Great value for my basketball player
customer_reviews.text: Fits my sons sneakers, full sized basketball, sweatshirt/shorts, water bottle and has compartment for phone/keys etc. good price. We have had it for several months and showing no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack holds a lot of things! We take it soccer practice every day and does not any signs of distress. It holds the cleats in a separate compartment away from other clothes. We also carry a spare soccer ball and still seem to have room to spare. I would recommend this for anyone who plays sports and has to transport many items.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Currier

customer_reviews.title: Torn after just 2 months of moderate use.
customer_reviews.text: The price for this backpack is OK, if it would have lasted. As you can see from the pictures, after just 2 months of moderate use the material has torn from the backpack. My 10 year old son, plays on a recreational team. There's no travel involved; once a week practice and once a week games for 6 weeks. I bought this item for him with the hopes it would last for more than one season. Instead, it tore in only 5 weeks into the season. Components are functional for all things soccer, however quality isn't good. Tried to get an exchange to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: RaiSal4

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use for his school stuff and basketball gear every Friday (that’s 1x a week!) when he has practice right after school. This bag did not last past 4 mos. and it’s falling apart! That’s a total of 16 days!? We really like the size and design of this bag but you’ll never know the true quality until you try it out. Well, it’s true that you get what you pay for. I hope this review will help others to make a better decision.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Quach

customer_reviews.title: I teach and coach rugby, hated having to lug around two bags/cases every day.
customer_reviews.text: I teach and coach rugby, hated having to lug around two bags/cases every day. Separate compartments make for good barrier for both work and sport. I keep my laptop in one and coaching gear in another. Place for my boots/cleats included. I still drop a anti-moisture crystal pack in the bottom to cut back on gym odors.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought two bags to help my daughters stay organized. I wanted their sports bag to be the same as their school bag, so they wouldn't forget something in their other bag. The zippers don't stay closed. Thought it might just be a bad one (even though there were two), so I returned them. Both returns had bad zippers. Now, the insides are ripping. It is a really bad rip. The material is cheap. I contacted the company before the first return, but they haven't ever answered me.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Brown

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a commute backpack. Roomy for my work shoes and clothes, waterbottle. etc. However, it is not waterproof, so keep that in mind. Other than that, this is a good backpack.
customer_reviews.author: rei_hiino@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer bag if your aren’t a band snob!’
customer_reviews.text: It has been 1.5 seasons with this bag (i am a coach) This bag is great! Plastic through and through for an easy clean! Big spot for cleats fit perfect (mine are size 11) Can fit all essentials including a safe place for playbook!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: It is a great sports bag. Seems durable and fits everything I need in it. Reason I give it 4 stars is it advertises that it fits two balls in bag. 2 soccer balls yes, but unfortunately two basketballs no. The shoe compartment is great as well. I'm able to fit size 11.5 shoes and an adult basketball along with my clothes with no problem at all. Overall great bag. I'll buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! This is the 2nd purchase for this product I have made. I have two teenagers in soccer and this bag fits everything they need and then some. It does the job and works as described. I'm very happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter to use when we left for the Gothia Cup in Sweden. She used it for less than a week and it has holes in the netting where she placed her water bottle as well as a tear where she puts her cleats. The deadline to return the product was the day we received the bag. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: i love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this backpack! There is so much room for all of my son's soccer gear and more. We could easily put two balls in with two pairs of shoes, an extra uniform, snacks and water, and still have room for more! The material the backpack is made of its lightweight and looks great! The back straps are ready to adjust and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this soccer backpack for my son's first soccer season, he LOVES IT!!! He was amazed by how many compartments their were for all his gear. Can't beat the price! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Charlos

customer_reviews.title: Durable good for football.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to haul his football gear. His helmet and cleats both fit in here with room to spare. Lasts too this will be our second season using.
customer_reviews.author: LBasich

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for basketball. It’s a nice big back pack but it still doesn’t have room for a basketball and his shoes. He can only put one or the other. If it was a little bigger that would be perfect. Otherwise he loves the bag, it light weight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia Lateef

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made for her in a while.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays soccer, she has an assigned achool soccer bag already but this one she now uses for some soccer as well as school books and supplies Mx she told me that she wants this type of bag every year now for the duration of her soccer/ academia career.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Little

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Use, Not Limited to Soccer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for elementary school child and this is a bit too big/long for her now, but we should be able to use it for many seasons as she grows taller. This is definitely roomy and has plenty of pockets to help keep dirty items away from other sports equipments. Definitely great for ski helmets and winter sports!
customer_reviews.author: Eastlaker1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as my kid literally puts this bag through the ringer every day. Stitching is good, sizing is great and overall a darn good bag for a sports active kiddo. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Dea

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and daughter play soccer and needed a good bag to stay organized These bags meet that need and above for organizing their gear. They feel and look rugged and well built Just waiting the test of a full season to evaluate long term durability and sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: Alan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Although the backpack appears to have good features, the mesh side pockets are very poorly constructed and have already ripped after just one week of use. This was definitely a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NYMom

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle holder mesh ripped...both sides...
customer_reviews.text: We like the bag itself. Issue is the side mesh to hold water bottles. Both sides ripped.
customer_reviews.author: SSK

customer_reviews.title: A great product at the right price if you ask me
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has served its purpose perfectly. My daughter needed something durable and functional, but this has a touch of style as well. Her primary sport is basketball, and she has been able to fit everything she needs for practice or game-day with ease. A great product at the right price if you ask me. I have recommended it to some of her teammates as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamel M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack fits EVERYTHING! Place for shoes, place for your ball, extra stuff fits.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Ward

customer_reviews.title: I bought the one that looks like a soccer gym bag and it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: Within one month the zipper handles 2 broke and the seams were coming apart. I bought the one that looks like a soccer gym bag and it's awesome. Very durable and my 14yr old agrees
customer_reviews.author: A. Berling

customer_reviews.title: even fits big shoes
customer_reviews.text: So this bag really fits everything he needs to play and ref. His shoes are a 12.5 and they fit easily along with his ball drink and all ref equipement.
customer_reviews.author: Tcouch

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer bag!
customer_reviews.text: So many separate pockets to keep everything in it's own place. My 9 year old can easily check if he has everything instead of pulling everything out of a duffle bag to check.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Discouraged customer
customer_reviews.text: The zipper ripped out of the bag within the first week. Very discouraged
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Fits our size 5 soccer ball with no issues. Love there is a separate section for cleats, ball, water m, and big pockets for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: KKM

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this to hold her barn things. Instead of a soccer ball she carries a riding helmet but other than that, many of the same things a soccer player would carry...clothes,water bottles ,sunscreen, change of shoes, etc...and has lots of room to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase and nice sports bag
customer_reviews.text: My son has a men’s size 11 foot. His cleats fit in the “shoe” compartment. He enjoys his bag. Likes being able to keep gear separate. Large enough to carry all of his stuff and a ball! Nice versatile bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Van Voorhis

customer_reviews.title: Good number of compartments, but very bad material
customer_reviews.text: The bag has tears all over I use the bag to carry my office laptop, a change of clothes and a lunch box, and soccer shoes. The bag has good number of compartments The material used is flimsy, and the bag is tearing all over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonsunder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fits everything for soccer!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Fits all of my daughters soccer gear!
customer_reviews.author: mas1219

customer_reviews.title: Only last 4 months before handle ripped off!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has only had this backpack for 4 months and the hook at the top of the backpack has completely ripped off. She uses this backpack everyday for school and it carries books, binders, and practice clothes and cleats. Would have thought this backpack would have lasted the rest of the school year or more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All their gear (including ball) stores nicely & shoes fit well in the shoe door (women’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One for child playing volleyball, the other playing basketball. All their gear (including ball) stores nicely & shoes fit well in the shoe door (women’s size 10 sneakers). I’m well pleased with its size & design. We wait to see about durability.
customer_reviews.author: mom_of_6

customer_reviews.title: Great size for soccer or basketball
customer_reviews.text: Great size for soccer or basketball, with a handy outside pocket for a water bottle. The separate lower compartment for shoes is a must! There is enough room left over for a few clothing items in the main compartment of the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer bag
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite bags that I've ever had. Extremely roomy, love that it has a spot for the shoes and soccer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice material and nice price.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the bag. It seems to be good quality. Nice material.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bag with plenty of storage space
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 10, 12, and 13 year old and they are all in love with their new soccer bags. So much room for their uniforms and equipment. As a mom, I especially love the separate cleat storage. Keeps the stink away from everything else! A+ quality and comfort. We love our Athletico bags!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G. Courson

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my 8yr old basketball player and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 8yr old basketball player and she loves it. It has a lot of space. I was able to get her ball, shoes and her inhaler ;) in this bag. Oh also her jogging pants that she wears over her shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Treecie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag. It fits his balls and shoes and stuff really well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size airline personal item for a weekend away!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size bag for a long weekend away. Features 2 large expandable sections with separate storage for shoes. Have bought one for myself and 2 others as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna J.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soccer bag for my granddaughter for Christmas. She's gonna love it. Of course, teal is her favorite color but it was not a color available. But the pink is awesome. She'll be able to find her bag quickly at her practices and game time. Great customer service and speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Burd

customer_reviews.title: Better to buy backpack with netting outside to hold ball
customer_reviews.text: It's a big backpack, it will hold a lot. However, the fact that the ball goes inside a pocket (rather than outside in netting like other products), takes away from some of the space inside the backpack. That's my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: The material looks sturdy. I’ll have a better opinion as the season ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the backpack for my son who’s playing 6th grade basketball. The backpack holds his ball (size 29.5”), shoes, uniforms (home/away), hoodie, etc. spots for water bottles. The material looks sturdy. I’ll have a better opinion as the season starts.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for school all football training
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for school all football training...the bag is a bit big .. But it holds all my son's books and football gears for training after school.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Seow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just loves her bag. It is perfect for her and holds everything she needs. The separate compartment for shows is perfect on muddy days.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good size but poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag due to the size a compartments included. Disappointed that it ripped on the inside at the seams after putting a ball in. Durability is questionable on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not rain proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a great back-pack and fits a lot in the pouches. I use this for gym clothes and shoes, as well as my lap-top and other computer equipment, and it works great for that. However when it rains, the outer pouches do not protect the contents and things will get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. 11 year daughter plays club soccer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. 11 year daughter plays club soccer and she carries everything she needs in it. Size 5 ball struggles to fit (so she says).
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: A great bag.
customer_reviews.text: One of the few bags with a separate and aerated pocket for shoes, a full sized pocket for a ball, and lots of room for pads, guards, etc. Solid build, nice materials.
customer_reviews.author: Nurnie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for good price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter in travel soccer. She finally started keeping all her gear organized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! My son plays on 4 different soccer leagues and uses that bag for all of them . Holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Daren Bryant

customer_reviews.title: perfectly sized
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Enough room to hold all of her gear, but not too big and bulky to make it on manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Bought to hold my cycling cleats and helmet.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a place to keep my cleats and helmet together in my truck and it has worked flawlessly. Keeps helmet protected, and shoes from rolling around. Love the fact the cleat compartment is ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: Coty Allen

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson Connor loved this backpack. Finally everything was organized in one place so nothing was left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a soccer/basketball player and this bag seemed perfect!...However, that is not the case. Bag started falling apart within 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius J. Willis

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good and fits all of his needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for my son. He plays on a traveling volleyball team. He is thrilled with it! The quality is very good and fits all of his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Pick a different bag
customer_reviews.text: One month into soccer season and I need to buy a new bag. The lining has torn and separated from the zipper. I expected this to be much more durable. The only items carried in it are socks, shin guards, and a ball....Definitely not enough to cause damage from excessive use.
customer_reviews.author: aguarr

customer_reviews.title: Gets Job Done
customer_reviews.text: its a little smaller than I would have wanted, the main storage compartment is tight when you have a ball and cleats in the bag. I would not have bought this if I saw it in person
customer_reviews.author: Tony bonitatibus

customer_reviews.title: Sized right
customer_reviews.text: Get for organizing all the mess. Bag is a perfect size for 10 year old soccer player.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy , very surprised at the amount of space in these bags my boys love them . We are going to attempt and use them for school bags also and see how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sized Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Perfect size, isnt too big for my 11 year-old to carry, but it holds everything. Ball, shoes, all uniforms and shin guards nice and neatly. Water bottle holders on each side.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Flag football bag too.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to hold flagfootball gear. It seems like it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: All you need for less money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. All the features of sports branded products at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good bag but liner ripped
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, great size... but liner ripped between two main sections of the bag. The rest has held up ok.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Great value, holds up very well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backpack, great price and really held up well for the soccer season.
customer_reviews.author: Been There

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soccer backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. My son uses it for his soccer gear.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: How does it all fit? It’s magic.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is unbelievable. Light weight and you can’t tell if a full size 5 soccer ball is inside plus school books cleats and change of clothes. Very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: christopher grant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect, my son loves it fits everything and more
customer_reviews.author: Jason Karlson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is perfect for my daughter for soccer! Everything she needs fits perfectly inside and it’s was half the cost of the ones on other sport sites. The quality is great for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling soccer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bag and all of the pockets to hold different things.
customer_reviews.author: Bzgone

customer_reviews.title: Mom of many school sports
customer_reviews.text: Great for all sports a day late but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for basketball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who plays high school basketball and this bag is beyond perfect he is able to fit all his basketball gear and school supplies. He really likes that he’s able to have his basketball sneakers in the bottom compartment separate from everything else’s.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Holds all of my daughters soccer equipment perfectly. Right down to her smelly soccer shoes!! It’s also ventilated so the shoes don’t get extra smelly being enclosed in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Pickel

customer_reviews.title: Size and idea is good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s (American) football and cleats. The sections between the cleats and ball does not look as sturdy as I had wished. Not sure how well it will last. Need to report the durability after a few Months use.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W

customer_reviews.title: Works for basketball too!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. I’m a Varsity basketball player at my highschool and I needed a bag that would last. Again I’m a highschool student so I don’t have much money, this bag is perfect. It lasted so well I’m using the same bag next season!!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Basketball Items
customer_reviews.text: Son really likes it and men’s basketball plus size 13 shoes fit
customer_reviews.author: Hester Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Plebty of room for gear and study materials during school soccer.
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Plenty of space for gear for a teenager and also a coupke of binders during school soccer. Compartment for cleats is great for easy access and cleanliness. I cannot speak to durability because we just got it, but zippers look sturdy and the material durable.
customer_reviews.author: eszter c. muranyi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for my son. He loves it. Has lots of space for all his gear.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: great multi-use backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. more than just for sports, its has a laptop compartment, lots of organizers and room for ball, sneakers, gloves, etc. my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: Large and durable bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Seems durable, and large enough to hold all my daughter’s soccer stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burke

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart and the seam started ripping. Not durable at all
customer_reviews.author: W. Bowler

customer_reviews.title: Large quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag and good quality. Very pleased with transaction and bag.
customer_reviews.author: jake geesey

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this bag he uses it for every sporting event that he does at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets and storage. I use as a gym bag and it has plenty of room for shoes, clothes and other toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Room for so many activities!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband's birthday and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

product_meta.title: Athletico National Soccer Bag - Backpack for Soccer, Basketball & Football Includes Separate Cleat and Ball Holder
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :15.25 x 11.5 x 3.9 inches; 1.52 Pounds
 * Date First Available :October 16, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Athletico
 * ASIN :B076HJ3J4F

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #13,999 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #9 inSoccer Equipment Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars718 ratings
feature_bullets: LARGE VENTED BALL COMPARTMENT - The front ball compartment is perfect for carrying a soccer ball, volleyball, basketball, or football
SEPARATE CLEAT COMPARTMENT - The bottom compartment is vented to carry your cleats or shoes and keep the stink out. When not in use, it is also large enough to carry a second soccer ball.

NOT JUST FOR SPORTS - The middle compartment features a 7 pocket accessories organizer, while the back compartment features a padded laptop sleeve. From school to the playing field, this backpack can carry it all.

RUGGED, COMFORTABLE, ERGONOMIC - Beyond its storage capacity, this soccer ball backpack is designed with padded, adjustable straps for a comfortable, ergonomic fit. Made with durable polyester and nylon fabric, this soccer bag is lightweight, yet rugged enough to withstand rain, mud, and dirt, allowing players to haul their gear in all weather conditions and outdoor environments.
BACKED BY THE ATHLETICO 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If your are not satisfied with your new Athletico Bag for any reason, simply return it for a full refund, no questions asked!
